Text:
OP here : I have a slow connection but will seed this torrent for months, so don't worry you will get it.
Once you do get it, please help me seed one of the best underrated TV show !

OP here : the season 1 is NOT the Icyflamez release which is a TVRip, the one is this torrent is the [js] release from the j0hnnie torrent, which is an uncensored DVDRip release with Dual Audio (normal and commentary). Way better as you can guess.
